meanings.definition: The quality or state of being large in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The bigness of the elephant amazed the children at the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The bigness of the mountain made it challenging to climb.
meanings.sent3: The bigness of the cake was so huge that it took the whole family to finish it.
meanings.sent4: The bigness of the ocean engulfed the tiny boat in its vastness.
meanings.sent5: The bigness of the dinosaur skeleton in the museum left visitors in awe.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being important or significant.
meanings.sent1: The bigness of the decision weighed heavily on his mind.
meanings.sent2: The bigness of the event made it a topic of discussion for weeks.
meanings.sent3: The bigness of the mistake he made was evident to everyone around him.
meanings.sent4: The bigness of the opportunity was too great to pass up.
meanings.sent5: The bigness of the achievement brought tears of joy to her eyes.
